issue.title: [C++] Speed up CSV parser with long CSV cells
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14940](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14940). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some CSV files may have long cells (values), for example if containing arbitrary texts or even things like timestamps. We can speed up parsing such CSV files by filtering multiple bytes at once for state-changing characters such as delimiters.
